questions.question: Clinic program and doctors.
questions.answer: Our clinic is opened Monday to Friday from 08:00 AM to 04:00 PM. Our doctors Vasile Albu (Cardiologist), Mihai George (Psychiatrist), Adrian Simon (Family doctor) are are experienced professionals dedicated to providing high-quality care.

questions.question: How to book an appointment?
questions.answer: An appointment can be booked via accessing and completing this google formular https://forms.gle/zgTxwju98QDJjodCA. Our clinic also provides booking available slots by phoning at 012345678, or physically at our clinic's front desk.

questions.question: What should I bring to my appointment?
questions.answer: Patients should bring their ID, insurance card (if applicable), and any previous medical records or test results related to their consultation.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept cash, credit/debit cards, and insurance-based payments (if applicable).
